Entry.JapaneseText: あ、あの……<Hilda>さん…… わたしに占いを教えてくれませんか？
Entry.EnglishText: Uh, um... <Hilda>... Could you teach me how to read fortunes?
Huh...? Why are asking that out of nowhere...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ちょっと興味があって……えっと、 でも、ご迷惑でしたら……わたし……
Entry.EnglishText: ...I was somewhat interested in it... But, um... If it's too much of a bother for you, then I...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……迷惑じゃないけど…… いいの？ 私なんかが先生で……
Entry.EnglishText: It doesn't bother me, but... Are you sure? I can't see someone like myself as a teacher...

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、でも、<Hilda>さんは、わたしなんかに 教えたくない……ですよね？
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, then, does that mean you don't want to teach someone like me?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……だから……迷惑じゃないし、 私でよければ教えてあげるわよ……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Well, it doesn't bother me. So, if you're okay with me being your teacher, then I can show you...

Entry.JapaneseText: タロットでできる、簡単な占いをね。
Entry.EnglishText: ...how to tell a simple fortune using the Tarot.
A-All right... Thank you very much!
